sections.heading: crossover, defined.Median crossover shall mean a connection between roadways of a divided highway the use of which may permit a vehicle to reverse its direction by continuously moving forward

sections.text:
60-633.Median crossover, defined.

Median crossover shall mean a connection between roadways of a divided highway the use of which may permit a vehicle to reverse its direction by continuously moving forward.

SourceLaws 1993, LB 370, ยง 129.
